metadata.title: CVE-2024-40952 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:ocfs2: fix NULL pointer dereference in ocfs2_journal_dirty()bdev->bd_super has been removed and commit 8887b94d9322 change the usagefrom bdev->bd_super to b_assoc_map->host->i_sb.  This introduces thefollowing NULL pointer dereference in ocfs2_journal_dirty() sinceb_assoc_map is still not initialized.  This can be easily reproduced byrunning xfstests generic/186, which simulate no more credits.[  134.351592] BUG: kernel NULL pointer dereference, address:0000000000000000...[  134.355341] RIP: 0010:ocfs2_journal_dirty+0x14f/0x160 [ocfs2]...[  134.365071] Call Trace:[  134.365312]  <TASK>[  134.365524]  ? Also log the handle details in this case.
